title: Member
responsibilities: Participated in weekly English club meetings and discussion groups
Assisted in organizing language practice sessions and small events
Contributed to preparation of presentations and club activities to improve public speaking skills

title: Tech Community Lead
responsibilities: Led weekly coding workshops for 50+ students covering web development and mobile development
Organized hackathons and tech talks featuring industry speakers from top Indonesian tech companies
Mentored junior students in competitive programming and software development projects

title: Vice President of Technology
responsibilities: Managed technical initiatives and development projects for 200+ active members
Coordinated annual tech competition (HCW) with 300+ participants
Developed internal tools and platforms to streamline organizational operations

title: Competitive Programming Team Member
responsibilities: Regular participant in ICPC and national competitive programming contests
Conducted training sessions on algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving techniques
Represented Polban in multiple inter-university competitions

title: Open Source Contributor
responsibilities: Active contributor to Flutter, Deno, and TypeScript ecosystem projects
Maintained personal open-source libraries with 500+ combined stars
Participated in community discussions and code reviews

title: Tech Volunteer
responsibilities: Volunteered on civic tech projects aimed at improving government digital services
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop accessible web applications
Contributed to digital literacy programs in underserved communities
